'''''Minecraft: Amazing Bite-Sized Builds''''' is a building tutorial book containing 20 small-scale builds.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|Learn how to design, build and customize 20 mini-projects in Minecraft, from space rockets and mineshaft trains to jungle shrines and lighthouses. There's even a marine tugboat! <br><br> With detailed instructions, block hacks and build tips, this book will teach you new tricks and help you practice old skills as you create bite-size builds to impress your friends in Minecraft.}}
